direct-sellers.title: Direct Sellers
direct-sellers.paragraph: Leveraging years of distributor experience, inPowerSuite supports multiple organizational configurations including Multi-Level Marketing and Party Plan verticals.

commerce.title: Commerce
commerce.paragraph: inPowerSuite provides a global web deployment platform for launching flexible, scalable web-store solutions in multiple languages and currencies for your business.

inpower-people.title: inPower Your People
inpower-people.paragraph: inPowerSuite empowers Sales People to be their best.

features.title: Features
features.paragraph: Explore our tools and capabilities for members to manage all aspects of their business operations.

tools.title: inPowerSuite Tools
tools.paragraph: Experience a robust, full-function business center for all active members where they can manage all of their respective back office operations. New and evolving features are continually being added.

app-manager.title: Application Manager
app-manager.paragraph: Our Application Manager provides essential functions to maintain customers, orders, catalog information, and store parameters.

integrations.title: Add-Ons & Integrations
integrations.paragraph: As an integration-ready platform, inPowerSuite provides complete support for e-commerce, fulfillment, content management, and financial operations.

support.title: Support
support.paragraph: ProjectWatchÂ® is a 100% web-based application and can be accessed with the unique user ID issued to you during client enrollment.

partners.title: Partners & Brands
partners.paragraph: inPowerSuite is used by some of the world's best brands.
